name: ax-hvdistr1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csm, co(c1, cva, c2)), co(co(c0, csm, c1), cva, co(c0, csm, c2))))
comment: Scalar multiplication distributive law. (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
